summary: Jester already grins before Beau cups her cheeks, she already closes her eyes before Beau presses her lips against hers, she...
body:
Jester already grins before Beau cups her cheeks, she already closes her eyes before Beau presses her lips against hers, she already keeps her arms tight around Beau’s waist before Beau can think about pulling away. 

Beau’s lips are soft; upon the realization, Jester wanted to break the kiss to tell her exactly what she thought of them, but somewhere between Beau caressing Jester’s cheek and Beau’s right hand sliding down to grip Jester’s hip, her mind blanks. So Jester focuses on not knocking their heads together too much (they’ve done it twice already). 

She keeps her weight on the tips of her toes in the hopes that Beau will sweep her off her feet. 

(She doesn’t.)

When Jester does pull away, she’s struck with the feeling that a bubble has popped in her chest. A bubble of warm, sticky syrup and fresh, maple syrup and cinnamon scones and pounds of powdered sugar on tiered chocolate cake. She reaches up to cup Beau’s cheek. “You’re so pretty, Beau,” she says frankly. 

Beau flushes and rubs the back of her neck. “You’re so pretty, too, Jester.” Her grin is lopsided and shows her teeth, but trying to stifle it is like holding back a flood with a single barrel. “Can I kiss you again?” 

Jester’s grin grows. She nods but makes it a point to stretch up and kiss Beau first.

Jester already grins before Beau cups her cheeks, she already closes her eyes before Beau presses her lips against hers, she already keeps her arms tight around Beau’s waist before Beau can think about pulling away. 

Beau’s lips are soft; upon the realization, Jester wanted to break the kiss to tell her exactly what she thought of them, but somewhere between Beau caressing Jester’s cheek and Beau’s right hand sliding down to grip Jester’s hip, her mind blanks. So Jester focuses on not knocking their heads together too much (they’ve done it twice already). 

She keeps her weight on the tips of her toes in the hopes that Beau will sweep her off her feet. 

(She doesn’t.)

When Jester does pull away, she’s struck with the feeling that a bubble has popped in her chest. A bubble of warm, sticky syrup and fresh, maple syrup and cinnamon scones and pounds of powdered sugar on tiered chocolate cake. She reaches up to cup Beau’s cheek. “You’re so pretty, Beau,” she says frankly. 

Beau flushes and rubs the back of her neck. “You’re so pretty, too, Jester.” Her grin is lopsided and shows her teeth, but trying to stifle it is like holding back a flood with a single barrel. “Can I kiss you again?” 

Jester’s grin grows. She nods but makes it a point to stretch up and kiss Beau first.

summary: Ok so like, has anyone considered just HOW LARGE Grog gets when he uses the titanstone knuckles??? Like, this is the regular...
body:
Ok so like, has anyone considered just HOW LARGE Grog gets when he uses the titanstone knuckles???

Like, this is the regular Grog to Gnome height difference (~8ft to 2.5ft)

It’s already super amusing! I love it! 

BUT THE ENLAGE SPELL DOUBLES HIS HEIGHT SO  YOU GET: (16ft to 2.5ft)

HNGGGGG??????? HOLY FUCK???? A GNOME FITS IN HIS PALMS!!!

summary:
Okay enough discourse on what Molly's feelings for Caleb were, show me fic or art where Molly Shags the Mighty Nein.
Or hell,...
body:
Okay enough discourse on what Molly’s feelings for Caleb were, show me fic or art where Molly Shags the Mighty Nein.

Or hell, doesn’t even have to be him actually shagging them, could be him flopping down on the ground next to Yasha (she’s sitting under a tree pressing flowers) and whining about how “they’re all so good looking! Why are they all so good looking, Yasha! Even Beau, and she’s just terrible!”

“Molly…am I good looking?”

Molly smirks up at her and puts a hand on her thigh gently. “Yasha, you’re fucking gorgeous.”

Yasha blushes a bit. “Oh…”

And then Molly goes back to whining about he’s too pan for this group, it’s too much.

blog.name: bboiseux
blog.title: Left of Empty
blog.description: Writing and Critical Role, sometimes other things. My AO3 | All the love to my fellow fic writers!

question: Beau, snow globe
answer:
Beau slammed the snow globe on the table and sat back into Lotus, releasing the tension from her body and breathing it out in one smooth motion.

The snow fell lazily from the top of the globe, delicately dancing around a model of the Tri-Spires.  Each flake traced its own journey.

Beau impassibly watched the snow fall, following a flake at a time as they weaved their way around the spires.

A smile tugged at her lips as two flakes danced together.

The smile vanished as another ended its journey early, trapped on a spire.

Beau took a cleansing breath.

summary: For all the peeps out there who identify with Caduceus: I miss Molly and would be ecstatic to see him come back, but I hope it's...
body: For all the peeps out there who identify with Caduceus: I miss Molly and would be ecstatic to see him come back, but I hope it’s never at the cost of Caduceus. I’m happy you’ve found a character that’s important to you and I hope you get to keep him forever. <3
